member1Des: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself :)
member2Des: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team :)
member3Des: Collaboration allows teachers to capture each other's fund of collective intelligence.
member4Des: To me, teamwork is the beauty of our sport, where you have five acting as one. You become selfless :)
member5Des: The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison :)
member6Des: None of us is as smart as all of us :)
